events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn't fit well and I would like to request a refund for the item.
The case has been categorized under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
An agent from the refund department has been assigned to handle the customer's request for returning the jacket.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your recent purchase. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for the refund so that I can assist you further?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket is too large and I would prefer to get my money back rather than an exchange.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated your refund request. You should expect the amount to be credited back to your original payment method within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
Your refund has been processed successfully. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are following up to ensure that you have received your refund and that everything was resolved to your satisfaction.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thanks again for all your help with this process.
Closing this case as the refund has been successfully completed and the customer is satisfied.
